attributes.action: Stop PIP stealth cuts qualifying criteria changes by DWP after budget climbdown
attributes.additional_details: I would like to remind every able bodied person reading this, when you see a disabled person down the high street being loud getting in everyone's way as you are queuing for you a skinny latte. You are seeing them having a good day "we don't see the bad one's EVERYONE DESERVES A GOOD DAY that what the personal independence payment gives them a good day so please sign and forward on this petition THANK-YOU from a husband of a wife with multiple sclerosis
attributes.background: The government gave an assurance to Parliament it wouldn't implement cuts to PIP across the board at the budget, but changing the qualifying criteria or point's associated with this system is a covert way  cutting costs by putting perfectly genuine vulnerable people into lower less costly categories
